raw_body:
GLADYS MENDIS – Loving wife of late Ebert Mendis,​ mother of Rohan,​ late Kumar,​ Shiromi,​ Shyamalee and Dorothy,​ mother-in-law of Sujeewa,​ Nadeeja,​ Dominic and late Kalinda,​ grandmother of Yasanga,​ Promodh,​ Dharshana,​ Natali,​ Natasha,​ Sajani,​ Achini and late Shehard,​ expired. Cortege leaves at 3.30 p.m. on Saturday,​ 6th April,​ for Burial at St. John De Baptist Church Cemetery,​ Nagoda. No. 339/​A,​ Negombo Road,​ Nagoda.
023729
